location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to The Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council in Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns government finances. Stannus writes to inform Elphinstone that he has granted to the Honourable Board bills of exchange for 6,500 rupees, to be carried to the debt of the Residency.
